579140.name: Elderine: Dreams to Destiny Soundtrack
579140.description:
These tracks were created specificly for Elderine: Dreams to Destiny by Steven Settinger.

Track list:
  • Elderine Main Theme
  • Elderine Forest
  • Jason Arrives at Glen Tirel
  • Crossing the Plains
  • Haspar the City of Trade and Royalty
  • Dirt, Rocks and Minerals
  • Books and Artifacts (Haspar Library)
  • Ruins of the Temple Town
  • Mountain Cave
  • Kate's Ocean

If more tracks are released to complement the game they will be added to this DLC at no extra cost. Currently two additional tracks are being composed.
